content: ADR-009: Consolidate tools using action-based parameters (playbook, memory, session, profiles, project, admin).
Use set_project(path) to switch Delia's active project context. Per-project data lives in <project>/.delia/.
PathsConfig.get_project_root() walks up from cwd looking for .git, pyproject.toml, package.json markers.
Tool registration happens in mcp_server.py via register_*_tools() functions from tools/*.py modules.
